parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the network ACL.

The description must be 1 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with http:// or https://.

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The direction in which the rule is applied. Valid values:

*   **ingress**
*   **egress**

parameters.name: NetworkAclEntryName
parameters.description:
The name of the rule.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with http:// or https://.

parameters.name: NetworkAclId
parameters.description: The ID of the network ACL.

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.description:
The action that is performed on network traffic that matches the rule. Valid values:

*   **accept**: allows network traffic.
*   **drop**: blocks network traffic.

parameters.name: PortRange
parameters.description:
The port range.

*   If you set **Protocol** to **all** or **icmp**, set this parameter to -1/-1, which specifies all ports.
*   If you set **Protocol** to **tcp** or **udp**, the port can be **1 to 65535**. You can set this parameter to **1/200** or **80/80**, which specifies ports 1 to 200 or port 80.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: The priority of the rule. Valid values: **1 to 100**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The type of the protocol. Valid values:

*   **icmp**: ICMP
*   **tcp**: TCP
*   **udp**: UDP
*   **all**: all protocols
